content:
CRD Block Votes 7 and 8 have been posted to the fm listserv. The vote will take place on 2/8/2022 FM call
The following is a link to JIRA for block vote 7: https://jira.hl7.org/issues/?filter=16575
The following is a link to JIRA for block vote 8: https://jira.hl7.org/issues/?filter=16574
